fields.name: Elixir of Ruin
fields.description: Level 9 required to purchase. Click to Consume: Grants +250 Health, 15% Bonus Damage to Towers and Siege Commander for 3 minutes. Siege Commander: Nearby minions gain 15% Bonus Damage to Towers and gain Movement Speed based on champion's Movement Speed. (Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)
